taskDescription: Drag the CC License types to the correct discription.Â
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

textField:
The *"BY NC ND"* license allows you to Retain; prohibits you to Revise or Remix; may or may not prevent you from Reuse or Redistribute.

The *"BY NC"* license allows you to Retain, Revise, or Remix; may or may not prevent you from Reuse or Redistribute.

The *"BY ND"* license allows you to Retain, Reuse, Redistribute; prohibits you from Revise or Remix.

The *"BY SA"* license allows you to Retain, Revise, Remix, Reuse, and/or  Redistribute under the same license.

The *"BY NC SA"* license allows you to Retain, Revise, and Remix; may or may not prevent you from Reuse or Redistribute.

The *"BY"* license allows you to Retain, Revise, Remix, Reuse, and/or Redistribute.
